org.mini2Dx.core.geom

Class RegularPentagon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Shape

        • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.RegularPentagon

  • public class RegularPentagon
extends RegularPolygon
    A pentagon where all interior angles are 108 degrees.
